ComicInfo.Summary: Moore ways than one to catch a Perg!: Perg, powerless during the day, dwells upon his past with Elizabeth. Alli discovers that she is a twin to Elizabeth and Lucifer uses this to convince her to go to Chicago. Dreadwolf meets a Forest Nymph who teleports him to Chicago.
